# setup for the MacOS

## useful package

```shell
# for zim exa module (now exa is not supported, so need to install eza)
brew install eza

# for zim utility module
brew install safe-rm

# for zim fzf module
brew fzf fd bat
$(brew --prefix)/opt/fzf/install --xdg --key-bindings --completion --update-rc --no-bash --no-fish
```
